trans-unit.source: The WebReferenceOptions class represents code generation options specified in an XML text file.
trans-unit.target: A classe de WebReferenceOptions representa as opções de geração de código especificadas num ficheiro de texto XML.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Serialization.CodeGenerationOptions"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref> com base nas opções de geração de código descritas no fluxo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> that contains the code generation options.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>que contém as opções de geração de código.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> estar associado a nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref> com base nas opções de geração de código descritas no fluxo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref> com base nas opções de geração de código descritas <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.</xref:System.IO.TextReader> especificado

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> that contains the code generation options.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextReader>que contém as opções de geração de código.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> estar associado a nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref> com base nas opções de geração de código descritas <xref:System.IO.TextReader>.</xref:System.IO.TextReader> especificado

trans-unit.source: Returns a new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref> based on the code generation options described in the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Devolve uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref> com base nas opções de geração de código descritas <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> especificado

trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>que contém as opções de geração de código.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"></xref> to be associated with the new instance of <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.Schema.ValidationEventHandler"> </xref> estar associado a nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>associada a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>associada a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchema>

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"></xref> that represents the schema importer extensions associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"> </xref> que representa as extensões de importador do esquema associadas a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.StringCollection"> </xref> que representa as extensões de importador do esquema associadas a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionImportStyle"> </xref> associada a este <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the target namespace for the <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>que contém o espaço de nomes de destino para o <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReferenceOptions"> </xref>.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A adicionar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref:System.Boolean> value that indicates whether verbose warning messages are to be generated during compilation of a client proxy or a server stub.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref:System.Boolean>valor que indica se as mensagens verbosas de aviso são gerados durante a compilação de um proxy do cliente ou um stub de servidor.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if verbose warning messages are to be generated during compilation of a client proxy or a server stub; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as mensagens verbosas de aviso são gerados durante a compilação de um proxy do cliente ou um stub servidor; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
